name: theMountain
description: This is a website for the fictional purchase of ski lift tickets and equipment rental.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin rentals.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/rentals.html && usemin tickets.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/tickets.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html

author: Steve Gant
